segments.text: Have you followed the value of dollar lately ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How could I help but follow it ? The fluctuation of dollar is killing my company ! The exchange rates are eating into our profits , and we can't do anything about it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's really frustrating , isn't it ? I have the same problem . I would feel a lot better if the currency was a little more stable . With the way the dollar plummeting lately , my securities have gone up in smoke .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Every day I have less money ! I haven't spent anything , it is just melting away because of the shifts in exchange rate .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What we really should be making investment in is the Euro . I've followed the Euro's progress over the last quarter , I think it's about time to buy in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you kidding ? The Yen is in worse shape than the Dollar !
segments.speaker: S1
